instruction: Create a 7-day meal plan for a vegan.
output:
Day 1: Breakfast - Overnight oats with chia seeds and berries; Lunch - Lentil vegetable soup; Dinner - Portobello mushroom burgers with sweet potato fries 

Day 2: Breakfast - Chocolate chia pudding with bananas; Lunch - Quinoa burrito bowls; Dinner - Black bean tacos 

Day 3: Breakfast - Avocado toast with tempeh bacon; Lunch - Creamy vegan caesar salad; Dinner - Chickpea curry with brown rice 

Day 4: Breakfast - Banana pancakes with nut butter; Lunch - Beetroot hummus wrap; Dinner - Spicy vegan chili

Day 5: Breakfast - Tofu scramble with spinach and tomatoes; Lunch - Caramelized onion, mushroom and spinach pizza; Dinner - Baked sweet potato with bok choy stir fry 

Day 6: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with banana, almond milk and spinach; Lunch - Zucchini noodles with roasted tomatoes and olives; Dinner - Roasted cauliflower with pecan and curry powder

Day 7: Breakfast - Oatmeal with almond milk, banana and walnuts; Lunch - Lentil and vegetable salad; Dinner - Eggplant and walnut stir fry
